entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
